name: Espresso Italiano
details: A classic Italian espresso with a rich flavor and a velvety crema.

name: Mocha Madness
details: A delightful blend of espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate, topped with whipped cream and cocoa powder.

name: Single-Origin Ethiopian
details: A medium-roast coffee with vibrant notes of blueberry and jasmine, sourced directly from Ethiopia.

name: Decaf Delight
details: A decaffeinated blend with a mellow flavor and a hint of nuttiness, perfect for those seeking a caffeine-free option.

name: Cold Brew Infusion
details: A refreshing cold brew coffee infused with natural flavors of orange and mint, served over ice.

name: Caramel Macchiato
details: A luscious combination of espresso, steamed milk, and caramel syrup, finished with a drizzle of caramel sauce.
